Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Destiny S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my grandparents after my 3 year old busted theirs. They love it! The audio isn't amazing, but they don't know the difference. Awesome picture quality.

Reviews.Title: WOW! WHAT A DEAL
Reviews.Author: VistaRebel
Reviews.Content: This 26 in HDTV is awesome for the price. I thought it would be too small for my 34 yr old daughter room. It turned out to be the perfect size. The picture is cyrstal clear, sharp and good looking. It was very easy for her to set it up, delete stations she doesn't watch. Her brother attached her DVD player and she and my only eight yr old grandaughter are thrilled with their "just because gift". Being a single mother, she always got the hand me down electronics. This is her first brand new TV. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Paul S.
Reviews.Content: Installed in a 32' foot Class A motor home.  Good quality picture and sound is okay. Not the best but for the money worked perfectly as an above dash mounted flat screen. We have been using it a lot in the last 6 months with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Tried to find something to like ... and failed!
Reviews.Author: Neil Rosenberg "The real Neil"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a slightly larger TV for our kitchen area, this seemed to be a good value.  Then when it arrived I re-discovered what a bad idea it is to buy a TV without first seeing it.  Perhaps my concerns won't be relevant to other potential buyers, but here goes anyway:1. The audio out jacks on the back of the TV don't work when using an HDMI source.  I wanted to hook the tv up to a pair of amplified speakers. It took 20 minutes on the phone with Orion (Sansui) tech support to discover the problem.  The documentation is at best misleading.2. The viewing angle is horrific, both left-right and up-down.  Blacks go from dark to gray with a few degrees of motion, whites get washed out.  There seemed to be no setting that yielded good viewing from more than one orientation.3. Even at the "optimal" viewing location, there was something distinctly wrong with the contrast no matter what I did to the settings.  Light scenes lose detail in a general white haze, darker scenes look muddy and shadow detail is gone.If none of the above matter to you, maybe this (cheap in every aspect) set is for you.  I returned it.

ProductInfo.Features:
1366 x 768 resolution
Connections: 2-HDMI, component, 2-composite, RCA L/R stereo, PC, coaxial digital audio out and RG6
8.5ms response time, 3000:1 contrast ratio and Brightness 400cd/m2
Integrated digital tuner with ATSC and Clear QAM
Panel: 24 13/16" W x 16 15/16" H x 3 3/16" D and VESA mount pattern 200 x 100
ProductInfo.Name: Orion 26IN HD LCD Tv
